entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Moving a type nested in a record to its own file creates a duplicate primary constructor declaration in the new partial record declaration #62713
  • Regression: RegisterPostInitializationOutput+AddSource added in source generator is duplicated resulting in compiler errors #62711

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `IMethodBodyOperationBase` should have a `Symbol` property #62705
  • LanguageSettingsPersister should Unadvise to the event sink #46167
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Implementation.Options.LanguageSettingsPersister loads settings eagerly (88ms) #29602
    Backlog
  • Replace usage of IVsTextManager4.GetUserPreferences4 with free-threaded alternative #56815
    17.3
  • LanguageSettingsPersister.TryFetch assertion is being hit #43393
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass LineFormatting options into OmniSharpCodeAction options #62712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62708
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62710
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62709
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62700
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62702
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62701
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation #62684
    Area-IDE, 17.4
  • Update SymReader to the latest version #62695
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.4
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62697
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add IWorkspaceProjectContextFactory F# wappers #62646
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62693
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62694
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62717
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62716
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62715
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow symbol keys to resolve against error symbols. #62681
    Area-IDE
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressable errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce errors for 'partial file record' #62686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
